programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: A collection of TV interviews paint a portrait of the former Beatle, singer-songwriter and political activist

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: In this edition the actor explores the luxury hotels of Hong Kong. Home to more skyscrapers than any other city, he first checks in to the Mandarin in the financial district, before experiencing the Four Seasons, the only hotel with two Michelin three-star resturants, as well as the timeless Peninsula in Kowloon, which even provides a Rolls-Royce airport taxi service. He ends his stay at the Ritz-Carlton, home to the worlds highest swimming pool

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor explores Berlin, visiting the arty Propeller Island City Lodge - a hotel where guests can fulfil their fantasies by sleeping in lion cages, coffins or rotating beds. At the Schlosshotel in affluent Grunewald, cabaret dancer Romy Haag talks to Richard about her affair with David Bowie, who stayed at the hotel while living in the German capital in the 1970s

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Tywin readies his son Jaime for battle as House Lannister prepares for conflict, and Ned confronts Cersei about what he has learnt while investigating Jon Arryns death. Meanwhile, at the Wall, Jon Snow waits to make his vows to the Nights Watch, and across the sea, Khal Drogo vows revenge on the Seven Kingdoms in response to the attempted assassination of Daenerys. Starring Charles Dance and Sean Bean

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Battle commences as the Lannisters launch their bid to seize the throne. Robb rounds up his allies as he prepares to confront Tywins troops, while Tyrion forms an unlikely alliance with a savage tribe. At Kings Landing, Arya and Syrio are forced to fight for their lives, and a sinister new enemy emerges at Castle Black. Meanwhile, Daenerys tries to reconcile her lust for power with the shocking brutality of war

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned struggles to endure his imprisonment at the hands of the Lannisters, and faces a fateful decision to save Sansas life - while Catelyn negotiates a deal with an unreliable ally. Tyrions father forces him to take to the battlefield, Robb seeks to prove his mettle in combat, and Daenerys power comes under threat as Drogos condition worsens. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robbs bannermen make a declaration that threatens to throw Westeros into disarray. Catelyn confronts Jaime Lannister about Brans near-fatal fall, Arya tries to flee the capital, and Tywin sends Tyrion on a surprising assignment. Jon Snow struggles to decide where his loyalties lie, and Daenerys tries to rebuild her life after a tragic event. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden and Michelle Fairley

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The seven kingdoms of Westeros prepare for all-out war as newly crowned King in the North Robb Stark marches south to avenge his father. Tyrion Lannister arrives in Kings Landing to curb the excesses of teenage tyrant Joffrey, and Stannis Baratheon, brother of the late King Robert, sets his sights on the Iron Throne. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Stephen Dillane, Richard Madden, Peter Dinklage and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion turns his anger on Cersei for alienating Joffreys subjects in the wake of the capitals bloody purge, and Theon returns to the Iron Islands for first time in nine years, where he discovers his father Balon is planning to rebel against the crown once again. Arya shares a secret with her new friend Gendry while travelling north to the Wall, and Davos Seaworth recruits an ally who may prove useful in Stannis Baratheons naval invasion of Kings Landing

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion strengthens his position as Hand of the King with a risky gambit devised to identify the member of the small council in league with his sister Cersei, while at Winterfell, Maester Luwin tries to help Bran make sense of his dreams. Catelyn travels to the Stormlands to foster an alliance with the Baratheons, but King Renly, his new wife Margaery Tyrell and her brother Ser Loras have other plans. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Starks chain of victories against the Lannisters enrages Joffrey, who punishes Sansa for her brothers successes. Tyrion struggles to find a way to curb his nephews cruel excesses and enlists Cerseis lover Lancel as an informant. Catelyn urges the Baratheon brothers to forgo their ambitions and unite against a common enemy, while across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys and her exhausted retinue arrive at the walled city of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Catelyn is forced to flee when the Baratheon brothers rivalry comes to a bloody end, and Lord Baelish spots an opportunity to further his own ambitions. Tyrion discovers Joffrey is planning to use a secret weapon to defend his seat of power, and Theon sails for the Stony Shore to prove his worth as a Greyjoy. Arya receives a favour from the man she freed from Harrenhal, and the Nights Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men to stem the advance of the wildling army

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Old Gods and the New
programme.desc: King Joffreys tyrannical rule prompts the people of Kings Landing to riot, with near devastating consequences for Sansa. Meanwhile, beyond the Wall, Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself. and across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys resolve strengthens as she vows to reclaim what she believes is rightfully hers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theons determination to prove his Ironborn status prompts him to embark on a hunt. Daenerys receives an invitation that could prove useful to her cause, and Jaime Lannisters fortunes appear to change after a meeting with a relative among Robb Starks captives. Fantasy drama, starring Alfie Allen, Emilia Clarke and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris uses her wits to get herself out of a corner and enlist policewoman Nico, while Joy meets mysterious genius Jensen Lind

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: A dark comic drama following the lives of three American mothers, as their seemingly perfect suburban lives begin to unravel with deadly repercussions

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: On their last night at the resort, Laurie, Jaclyn, and Kate are forced to reckon with the changes in their decades-long friendship. Belinda negotiates a deal with Zion that could secure her future, Gaitok shares his plans with a disappointed Mook and Timothy comes up with a shocking plan for his family.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Following the break-up of his marriage, Tony visits his former therapist Dr Melfi in the hope their relationship can become more than just professional, while newlywed Janice decides to keep up a Sunday tradition. Carmela and AJ find themselves unexpectedly communing with nature, a bill causes problems for Christopher, and with several organised crime figures due out on parole, the balance of power in the Soprano family business looks set to alter dramatically. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Edie Falco and Lorraine Bracco

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Steve Buscemi joins the cast as family cousin Tony Blundetto, recently released from prison. Tony meets Jack Massarone on the eve of the museum opening, unaware that his fellow mobster is now working for the FBI - but the closed-mouthed crook manages to avoid incriminating himself. Carmela finds a new interest, Adriana wrestles with guilt, and old memories haunt Christopher and Paulie

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Carmine Lupertazzi dies without naming a successor, presenting Johnny Sack with the opportunity to seize control in the New York organisation. Unfortunately, Lorraine Calluzzo fails to acknowledge his new-found power, prompting him to take extreme measures. She approaches Tony for help, and the Mob boss attempts to negotiate a power-sharing plan with Johnny. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Carmela and Tony try to put their differences aside to discuss their sons future, but AJ himself is more concerned with having the night of his life in New York. Feech takes a trip down memory lane, while the power struggle between Johnny Sack and Little Carmine erupts into all-out war - and Lorraine is the first casualty

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the citys famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. On a journey that takes in an 18th-century pleasure house and a burlesque life-painting class, Alan also stops off in Temple Bar for a pint with singer Sharon Corr, unlocks a mystery in Irelands oldest library and uncovers a stylish secret that lurks behind the steel shutters of an old lock-up

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Art and life collide as John Kaplan, a courier carrying Andy Warhols famous Pink Marilyn, arrives in New York City. Kaplan attempts to juggle the Mob and his talent as an art forger with his complicated love life. Crime drama, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emile Hirsch, Paz Vega and Jeremy Piven

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against supervillain Steppenwolf, but despite the help of Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash, it may already be too late to save the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Youngster Billy Batson is chosen by the ancient wizard Shazam as his new champion, and receives various superpowers. Together with his best friend Freddy Freeman, Billy must come to terms with his new talents in order to stop the evil Dr Thaddeus Sivana. Comedy adventure based on the Captain Marvel and Shazam comics, starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong and Asher Angel

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Steve Vail is reactivated when an extortionist targets the agency. Director Renny Harlins thriller based on the Noah Boyd novel, starring Aaron Eckhart, Nina Dobrev and Clifton Collins Jr

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Youngster Billy Batson is chosen by the ancient wizard Shazam as his new champion, and receives various superpowers. Together with his best friend Freddy Freeman, Billy must come to terms with his new talents in order to stop the evil Dr Thaddeus Sivana. Comedy adventure based on the Captain Marvel and Shazam comics, starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong and Asher Angel

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerichs action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangsters henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, a kidnapped girl grows into a warrior who seeks vengeance against a great biker horde led by the crazed Dementus. Director George Millers Mad Max: Fury Road prequel, starring Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth and Tom Burke

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the days takings from the citys subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European en route to America is stranded at JFK Airport when a coup in his native country leaves him in a diplomatic no-mans land. His nation ceases to exist, meaning he can neither return home nor set foot on the streets of New York. Stuck indefinitely inside the terminal, he sets out to make some sort of a life for himself. Steven Spielbergs comedy, with Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci and Chi McBride

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes she could skip the misery of growing up and become an adult overnight. However, the next day she wakes up to find 17 years have mysteriously passed and she is now a successful magazine editor approaching her 30th birthday - and her new life is just as hard to cope with as her old one. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo, Christa B Allen and Andy Serkis

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughters wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Its five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mothers past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureaus publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughters wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Its five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mothers past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An overweight high-school student is madly in love with his best friend, but their feelings are far from mutual. Years later, having slimmed down and become a successful music executive, he resolves to put an end to his unrequited love and finally win her over. Romantic comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Amy Smart, Anna Faris and Chris Klein

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The eccentric pet detective is coaxed out of self-imposed exile in a Buddhist monastery to visit Africa and help search for a sacred white bat. However, his unique investigative talents are tested to the limits as he faces a race against time to find the missing creature and prevent a tribal war. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey, Simon Callow and Bob Gunton

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegels Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Leans Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parkers psychological drama, based on William Whartons novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A military officer goes in search of a power-mad general who is holding several hostages in a secret location. He soon finds he is not the only one on the maniacs trail, and joins forced with a mismatched band of martial artists to save the captives. Action adventure based on the video game, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Kylie Minogue and Ming-Na Wen

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitlers plans for world domination - aided by Joness deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielbergs action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the days takings from the citys subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitlers plans for world domination - aided by Joness deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielbergs action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making peoples lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth

programme.title: Dog Man

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: A science teachers life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town. Sci-fi comedy drama, starring Brandon Routh, Mena Suvari and Malina Pauli Weissman

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Two misfits embark on a road trip, take a dubious deal and find redemption amid shady circumstances. Crime thriller, starring Carrie Coon and Shea Wingham

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: After a young girl bursts into their home psychiatry practice claiming an entity is feeding on her, Jordan and her clairvoyant mother must find a way to stop the evil. Horror, starring Shawn Ashmore and Ashley Greene

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne

programme.title: Grow

programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Two misfits embark on a road trip, take a dubious deal and find redemption amid shady circumstances. Crime thriller, starring Carrie Coon and Shea Wingham

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A strangers claim that a couples 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Thirty young men and women are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Tye Sheridan and Lily-Rose Depp

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barretts relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Nasa astronauts Kira Foster and Christian Campbell travel to the International Space Station (ISS) on a Soyuz rocket to join American compatriot Commander Gordon Barrett. They will share the orbiting structure with three Russian cosmonauts. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045, gamers explore a virtual world in the quest for a deceased tycoons fortune. However, they must also contend with an evil corporation who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the prize. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Ernest Clines novel, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist attempts to save her career by turning to investigative podcasting. She soon starts to wonder if a strange artefact is linked to an alien conspiracy, or whether she is losing her mind. Director Matt Veselys thriller, starring Lily Sullivan

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorkes Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. They must rally their small force of 140 men against the might of 4,000 Zulu warriors advancing on their position. Fact-based historical drama, starring Michael Caine, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, Nigel Green and Chief Buthelezi, with narration by Richard Burton

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the citys gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Gangster biopic, starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson as Spencer Strasmore, a former American football player who, after retiring from the game, is living the high-life as a financial manager for a ever-growing roster of hard-partying NFL stars. The series begins as the death of an old team-mate in a car accident provides Spencer with an incentive to make some positive changes to his life. With JD Washington, Rob Corddry and Omar Miller

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Joe realises the firms decision to hire Spencer might be about to pay off when the former NFL player reveals he has all but secured a contract with current star Vernon Littelfield. However, before Littelfield will sign on the dotted line, Spencer must run his plans by Vernons childhood friend and advisor Reggie. Meanwhile, Ricky clashes with a new team-mate during his first practice session with the Dolphins, and Larry Seifert urges lineman-turned-car salesman Charles to consider returning to the game. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Joe borrow Old Man Andersons yacht to host an exclusive party, aiming to attract more high-income athletes to the firms books. As the event gets under way, Spencer tells Ricky why fellow Miami player Alonzo dislikes him so much, and a drunken Joe makes a connection with the young players - but doesnt forget to push Andersons agenda. Comedy drama, starring Dwayne Johnson and Rob Corddry

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Jason tell Vernon he has received $101million offer from Dallas, but their work on his behalf seems to be in vain as Reggie urges him to hold out for more. Meanwhile, a hung-over Joe hi-jacks Andersons yacht as he aims to court more star players, and Charles receives unwanted attention from a girl he met at the party. Comedy drama, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers

Meanwhile, Ricky tries to patch things up with teammate Alonzo by taking him out to a strip club, and Charles makes a fatal error in hiding his secret relationship with stalker-fan Sammi. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, JD Washington, Rob Corddry and Omar Miller

Romantic comedy horror, with Nicholas Hoult, Teresa Palmer and John Malkovich

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Tony Robinson embarks on another expedition through some of Britains most historic landscapes. The moors and valleys of West Yorkshire were the home of, and inspiration for, the Brontës, the literary family who produced such classics as Wuthering Heights and Jane Eyre. Over four days, Tony heads out from the Victorian wool capital of Bradford and treks in a giant loop around what is now known as Brontë Country. From the birth of Charlotte, Emily, Anne and their brother Branwell in the suburb of Thornton, he traces their childhoods to the much-romanticised Brontë hub of Haworth, finding that the harsh reality of life in the 1820s was far removed from the fantasy world dreamed up by the children at their fathers parsonage home

programme.sub-title: Ice Age Camp and a Saint with Syphilis

programme.title: Secrets in the Dark
programme.desc: Documentary shedding light on unusual discoveries made in the darkest places on Earth. The fate of Pharaoh Ramses III has been clouded by rumours of a family plot against him. This film explores the tomb and uncovers evidence to support this

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: The X-Files actor reveals that from the CIAs decades-long pursuit of the perfect truth serum to the US Armys secret PsyOps in Vietnam, mind games have long been at play

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: The actor reveals how undercover agents endured severe psychological strain while living double lives infiltrating dangerous worlds. Secret ops have showcased their sacrifices

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: The actor examines Stalins gruesome trials to create a hybrid human-ape super army, the eerie reason East Germanys Stasi collected the scents of dissidents in airtight jars and how the CIA uncovered a secret Soviet island devoted to developing deadly bioweapons

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: The presenter recovers declassified files that reveal Nasas secret moon nuke plan, the USSRs covered-up space tragedy and US spy satellite projects that led to space stations - all part of a classified space race

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: The unexpected gadgets relied upon by spies - from modified toys saving informants to hair-based disguises to spy balloons mistaken for UFOs. Often, government secret tech succeeds by defying expectations

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Archaeologists discover an unusual man-made rock formation in the remote Altai Mountains of Russia, and conducting a further excavation, unearth an ancient log cabin and the mummified remains of two bodies buried deep in the frozen permafrost

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Archaeologists discover human remains during an excavation of a fifth-century fort on the Swedish island of Oland. After further investigation, experts unearthed 26 skeletons and uncover the site of an ancient massacre

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Aohe Kahi e Pee Ai (Nowhere to Hide)
programme.desc: Return of the police drama. A terrorist using weaponised drones targets the island of Oahu, so the team must mobilise to prevent the imminent attack. McGarrett and Danno open up about their friendship during a session with a psychologist, while the arrival of Maxs new trainee Mindy causes a stir. Alex OLoughlin, Scott Caan and Masi Oka star, with Jorge Garcia (Lost) joining the cast having made guest appearances in season 4

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The cops investigate the kidnapping of a Navy Seals daughter, only to hit a dead end while trying to determine the culprits motive. programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A robbery goes wrong for a trio of female thieves when they steal something that proves so valuable, they end up with a price on their heads - so Kono goes undercover as a surfer to infiltrate the gang. programme.title: Hawaii Five-0

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Adalind returns to avenge her mothers death, and blackmails Renard into helping her. Juliette confesses to Nick that she has feelings for another man

programme.title: Grimm

programme.title: Grimm

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Following his visit to the Great Barrier Reef in 1957, naturalist and broadcaster David Attenborough returns and uses the latest filming techniques to unlock the secrets of the natural wonder. In the first edition, he descends beneath the waves at night and uses cutting-edge technology to generate computer scans of the sea floor. He also learns about a complex community of animals, as well as the annual coral spawning, which is responsible for the great diversity in the reef

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest technology, the naturalist explores the shark-infested waters of Osprey Reef in the Triton submersible, before returning to the nesting grounds of the Green Sea Turtle, 60 years after his first visit to Raine Island. He also marvels at manta ray cleaning stations on Lady Elliot Island, and tracks dwarf minke whales to discover their surprising reasons for returning, and why the reef is vital for their survival

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: The naturalist examines what the next few decades may hold for this remarkable ecosystem, and looks at the work of scientists who are trying to preserve the area and the species that inhabit it, assisted by research vessel the Alucia. He also embarks on an ambitious attempt to dive further into the reef than ever before to witness the resilient coral that live down in the depths and see if they hold answers that may help to overcome challenges that lie ahead, as the impact of humans on the reef continues to take its toll

programme.title: Carna an Cheoil agus na nAmhrán
programme.desc: For over a century, music collectors have flocked to Carna in Connemara, drawn by its rich Gaelic traditions. Here, songs, music, dance, and storytelling have been preserved, offering a rare glimpse into Irelands ancient cultural roots. The echoes of those early collectors still linger in Carna today, and their recordings continue to shape its cultural identity. This programme examines Carnas vibrant heritage, exploring the treasures passed down through generations and meeting the new wave of locals proudly keeping their native culture alive today

programme.title: Transatlantic Sessions - Togha agus Rogha
programme.desc: Musical stars from Ireland, the UK and the US, including Andy Irvine, Martha Wainwright and Iain Morrison. Presented by Julie Fowlis and Muireann Nic Amhlaoibh

programme.title: Ó Mhuir go Tír
programme.desc: Daily life in rural communities, focusing on the primary and secondary students who travel to and from Árainn Mhor, Sherkin and Inis Oírr. Featuring former island students who had to reside in boarding schools and homes on the mainland to get an education in the 1970s and 80s. Roisín and Niamh discuss their love of island life on Ceann Cleire and their fears for the future of the island

programme.title: An Buachaill Gealgháireach
programme.desc: The untold story of Irish song The Laughing Boy, written by Brendan Behan in memory of revolutionary, soldier and politician Michael Collins. With an extraordinary afterlife as To Yelasto Paidi, it became the powerful left-wing anthem of resistance in Greece in the late Sixties. The film takes poet Theo Dorgan on an odyssey of his own, as he uncovers the truth of the story behind the song. It is a narrative that interweaves the tragic and bloody birth-pangs of both modern Ireland and modern Greece. However, these histories are also bound together by something more profound and transcendent - the power of a song

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Phill Jupitus go on a day out, testing a range of gadgets and technology, from the worlds tiniest caravan to 360-degree cameras, 300 litre rucksacks and a pair of trousers that transform into a picnic table. Back at home, Richards technical team sources contraptions that allow him not only to visit Maidstones Teapot Island from the comfort of the visitor car park, but also to join Phill on a taxing country hike - without expending any energy

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade asks farmer and foodie Jimmy Doherty to join him for a visit to the supermarket to trial gadgets designed to ease grocery shopping, including a robotic assistant, a fruit ripeness reader and a food ethics scanner. He then turns his attention to clothes shopping and heads to a department store, with actress Alison Steadman in tow, to test a 3D virtual mirror and a check out a mannequin with expanding bust and hips

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode, an unlikely pairing enrages bidders in Birmingham, Linda is determined to keep her game face on despite Dans jibes, and Nat and John are at each others throats. Sean Kelly hosts

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sparks are flying in Royston, Hertfordshire, and not just amongst the bidders as the contents of a bin goes up in smoke, and a mystery object under tarp causes a cat-fight. Seans flying skills are put to the test and Nat and John take a gamble on a double unit - but will it pay off?

programme.title: Railroad Australia
programme.desc: A re-tooled grain train springs some leaks, Bernies Streamliner festival faces disaster and the Pichi Richi Explorer takes part in a crazy race in South Australia

programme.title: Railroad Australia
programme.desc: In Victoria, a crack team races to build the states VLocity trains of the future. Slippery tracks and kangaroos throw a 5,000-tonne coal train off its path to port

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The trio travel to Italy to test high-performance hatchbacks. Jeremy Clarkson is in the Citroen DS3 Racing, Richard Hammond champions the Fiat 500C Abarth and James May makes the case for the Renaultsport Clio 200 Cup as they navigate their way round baffling Italian towns and take part in a scavenger hunt, before putting the cars through their paces on the F1 street circuit in Monaco. Also, petrolhead comedian Ross Noble is in the Reasonably Priced Car and the McLaren MP4-12C supercar comes under review

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Comedians Phill Jupitus and Marcus Brigstocke head to Bolivia for a high-altitude trip, first driving along the infamous Road of Death, only to find themselves deep in bandit country. Disorientation takes them by surprise as they have to navigate Salar de Uyuni - a salt lake so vast that Buzz Aldrin could see it from space. Their goal is the ancient mountain city of Potosi, whose silver mines financed the Spanish empire in the 16th century and which is almost 5,000 metres above sea level

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert and friend and fellow comedian Angela Barnes cross Italys most treacherous Alpine roads in Rhods first adventure since being treated for cancer

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor heads for the coast of Kenya, where he encounters a large wahoo fish while searching for dorado, before going back to basics to learn a traditional fishing technique that consists of just lines and bare hands. He also visits Lake Victoria, where an unusual method is employed to catch whitebait

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Comedians Miles Jupp and Bob Mortimer and actresses Samantha Morton and Sarah Hadland join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds such as Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman, the Rev Kate Bottley, Sara Barron and Ed Gamble join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds such as Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Sara Pascoe, Dan Walker, Nicola Coughlan and Mr Motivator to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Joel Dommett, Sindhu Vee, Alex Horne and AJ Odudu to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Maya Jama, Roisin Conaty, Roman Kemp and Xand van Tulleken to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Johnny Vegas, Alex Jones, Martin Lewis and Anna Maxwell-Martin to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.sub-title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Cash-strapped Alison and Mike think all their problems have been solved when they inherit a grand country house, unaware that it is falling apart and teeming with the ghosts of former inhabitants. The spooks must act immediately to halt the new owners plans to turn the house into a hotel, but their attempts to scare them away fail miserably. Comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe, Mathew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard and Ben Willbond

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Alison finds herself hounded by the ghosts, who now realise she can both see and hear them, and tries to ignore their existence - a tactic which only exacerbates the problem when the Captain puts the ghosts onto a war footing. Meanwhile, Mikes attempts to turn the house into a home leads to a DIY disaster, saddling Lady Button with an ill-suited roommate, and Julian learns about his questionable legacy when the spooks discover the internet. Comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Simon Farnaby

Comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Simon Farnaby
